publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4026 Mike Pringle: Move Scottish Cup Semi-Final to Murrayfield—That the Parliament congratulates Hearts and Hibs on reaching the Scottish Cup semi-final; agrees with many supporters of each club that this match should be played in Edinburgh, and calls on the Scottish Football Association to move the game to Murrayfield so that 15,000 more fans could attend the game and to prevent travel chaos when 50,000 supporters try to get to Hampden from Edinburgh. Supported by: Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Margaret Smith*, Mr John Swinney*, Phil Gallie*, David McLetchie*, Robin Harper*
S2M-4026 Move Scottish Cup Semi-Final to Murrayfield (lodged on 28 February 2006) Mr Jamie Stone*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mr David Davidson*, Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-4026 Move Scottish Cup Semi-Final to Murrayfield (lodged on 28 February 2006) Mrs Mary Mulligan*, John Home Robertson*

S2M-4026 Mike Pringle: Move Scottish Cup Semi-Final to Murrayfield—That the Parliament congratulates Hearts and Hibs on reaching the Scottish Cup semi-final; agrees with many supporters of each club that this match should be played in Edinburgh, and calls on the Scottish Football Association to move the game to Murrayfield so that 15,000 more fans could attend the game and to prevent travel chaos when 50,000 supporters try to get to Hampden from Edinburgh. Supported by: Mr Andrew Arbuckle, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Margaret Smith, Mr John Swinney, Phil Gallie, David McLetchie, Robin Harper, Mr Jamie Stone, Tommy Sheridan, Mr David Davidson, Nora Radcliffe, Mrs Mary Mulligan, John Home Robertson
